name: Petalen

abilities.name: Terra Growth
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Nature-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Agility (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Speed stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

description: Petalen like to live in the forest and enjoy brushing themselves on leaves and bushes. They move swiftly between trees and their tails are used as a sharp blade that cuts down their foes and prey.

moves_level.name: Growl
moves_level.effect: Let out a growl that lowers the opponent(s)' Melee Attack by one stage.

moves_level.name: Dodge
moves_level.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves_level.name: Razor Leave
moves_level.effect: Attack the opponent with razor sharp leaves. This move has 10% critical hit chance.

moves_level.name: Quick Strike
moves_level.effect: Lunges at the opponent quickly before the target can react. This move has a +1 priority.

moves_level.name: Stalk
moves_level.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

moves_level.name: Copycat
moves_level.effect: Copy the move used immediately before the user. If no moves have been used, this move will fail.

moves_level.name: Fury Cutter
moves_level.effect: Slash the opponent with scythe-like attack. Consecutive success uses of this move increases the power by 5 each time (Max. 30).

moves_level.name: Aerial Strike
moves_level.effect: Strike the opponent with quick movement in the air. This attack has a 10% critical hit chance.

moves_tutor.name: Dodge
moves_tutor.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves_tutor.name: Rest
moves_tutor.effect: Rest for 2 turns. This move fully restores the user's HP.

moves_tutor.name: Substitute
moves_tutor.effect: Create a substitute that serves as the user's decoy with the cost of a quarter HP.

moves_tutor.name: Endure
moves_tutor.effect: Endure upcoming attack(s) for 1 turn, leaving at least 1 HP, but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other faint-cheating moves.

moves_tutor.name: Dig
moves_tutor.effect: Burrow into the ground and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Earth typed moves during this turn.

moves_tutor.name: Shadow Slash
moves_tutor.effect: Slash the opponent with claws made from shadow. This move has a 10% critical hit chance.

moves_tutor.name: Grassy Blast
moves_tutor.effect: Draw power from nature and blast at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.
